hero.heading: Fluent Flow: Speak English like a native
hero.subheading: Learn everyday expressions, slang, and informal terms easily and in a fun way

cta.heading: Unlock your English
cta.subheading: Understand and speak everyday English, level up your English with Fluent Flow

section1.title: Speak English like a native speaker
section1.description: New lists of words, expressions, and daily phrases for you to learn.

bullet1.title: Expressions and Phrases
bullet1.description: Finally understand those phrases from movies and TV shows that you never quite got.

bullet2.title: Speak naturally
bullet2.description: Learn to speak English naturally, with slang and understand how natives speak in everyday life.

bullet3.title: Speak quickly with informal contractions
bullet3.description: Learn to speak English quickly and naturally with informal contractions, as used daily by native speakers.

section2.title: Learn with real examples
section2.description: Learn with real examples in videos and much more.

bullet1.title: Real contexts and examples
bullet1.description: Your brain will memorize better with real contexts and examples.

bullet2.title: No fluff, just the essentials
bullet2.description: Made for you to learn the essentials and speak English from day one.

section3.title: Simplicity and ease
section3.description: Made for students to learn the essentials and speak everyday English.

bullet1.title: Simple and practical
bullet1.description: Made for you to learn without complications, just memorize and practice.

bullet2.title: Content updated daily
bullet2.description: Get new content and updates daily.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our service.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Welcome to our English learning application. By accessing or using our application, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy.

section2.title: 2. Definitions
section2.content:
"Service" refers to the English learning application.
"You" refers to the individual accessing or using the Service, or the company, or other legal entity on behalf of which such individual is accessing or using the Service.

section3.title: 3. Terms of Use
section3.intro: You agree not to misuse our Service or assist anyone else in doing so. For example, you must not attempt to:

items.1: Copy, modify, or distribute the application's content without permission
items.2: Use the Service for commercial purposes without authorization
items.3: Access other users' or system data without permission
items.4: Interfere with the functioning of Firebase or integrated YouTube videos

section4.title: 4. Intellectual Property
section4.content: Our Service and its original content, such as texts and study collections, are and will remain the exclusive property of the developer and its licensors, protected by copyright laws.

section5.title: 5. Termination
section5.content: We may terminate or suspend your access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including, without limitation, if you breach the Terms.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: In no event shall we be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including, without limitation, loss of data or other intangible losses resulting from the use of the Service.

section7.title: 7. Changes
section7.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. Changes will be posted in the application.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at [insert contact email].

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.intro: We may collect the following types of information:

items.1: Personal Information: Such as your name and email address when you register for an account.
items.2: Usage Data: Information about how you use our application, including collections accessed and videos watched.
items.3: Device Information: Information about the device you use to access our application, including hardware model and operating system.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.intro: We use the information we collect to:

items.1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.4: Analyze usage trends to enhance content
items.5: Ensure the proper functioning of Firebase

section3.title: 3. Sharing and Disclosure of Information
section3.intro: We do not share your personal information except in the following limited circumstances:

items.1: With Your Consent: We will share your personal information with third parties when we have your consent to do so.
items.2: For Legal Reasons: We will share personal information if we believe in good faith that it is necessary to comply with laws, regulations, or government requests.
items.3: With Service Providers: We may share your information with Firebase, which stores data to provide the service.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the personal information we collect and process about you.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information, as well as restrict the processing of your data, subject to applicable laws.

section6.title: 6. Children's Privacy
section6.content: Our Service is not directed to children under 13 years of age, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

section7.title: 7. Changes to This Privacy Policy
section7.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy in the application.

section8.title: 8. Contact Us
section8.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [insert contact email].
